comment.body:
> [r3](#comment_5_1UfvLnMuzShvi3phWGSqn79tio81Wn9Dt): 如果有人将每次的ZeroNet的博客翻译成中文就好了，希望有志愿者出现^_^

googel translate: If someone every time ZeroNet's blog translated into Chinese is good, I hope to have volunteers appear ^ _ ^
any documentation about the "Optional file download"

is the beginning of the url on purpose? "1Gif"? :)

it plays in my firefox but not in chrome windows 7 32 bit

awesome!
i would love to test that

> [oracle](#comment_3_1ED3Ho3kmzaKiECtyuqSjDpoE47rKuXeP): Question - I just cloned a new blog instead of doing it the manual way. Do I have to still have to do this> Copy all file from data/1BLogC9LN4oPDcruNz3qo1ysa133E9AGg8 to data/[Your new site address displayed when executed siteCreate] directoryDelete data directory and rename data-default to data to get a clean, empty siteRename data/users/content-default.json file to data/users/content.json

no i guess it is not needed anymore if you clone it
